name: Doctor Borous
descriptions: Doctor Borous is a scientist living in Big MT in 2281.

Before the Great War, the boy who would later become Borous was a child prodigy who had been bullied in American High by a classmate named Richie Marcus. He also had an unrequited crush on another student, Betsy Bright, who had turned him down for Richie and picked on him as well. His only friend was his dog, Gabe.

Later in his life, he became a part of Big MT's staff as head of the X-8 cyberdog project and began cruelly experimenting on his own dog Gabe, feeding him various drugs such as psycho. However, due to errors in programming, he was forcibly sealed in an unfinished section of X-8's test areas, as a "...precaution."

After the Great War, together with the rest of the Big MT "Think Tank" executives, the doctor became a think tank to continue his work at Big MT. However, when he started to show symptoms of the insanity that began to consume his comrades, Doctor Mobius, the sole sane researcher, wiped his pre-War memories, hacked his data banks and gave him the name "Borous", all to keep him and his colleagues forever trapped in the Big MT, so that they could never unleash the horrors of the crater on the unsuspecting world around them.
Doctor Borous is the "Head of Animalogy, Beastology, and DNA-Scrambling technology" at the Big MT, and created both the night stalkers and cazadores.

If the player character has shown Borous Gabe's bowl before completing Old World Blues, and the player character does not have a 100 in Science or 85 in Medicine to convince Dr. Klein, Borous will side with the player character in convincing Klein to back down.
After A Brain's Best Friend has been completed, once a day, the player character can ask Borous what animals he has experimented on today and he will give the player character some of their parts:
Borous appears only in the Fallout: New Vegas add-on Old World Blues.
role: Head of Animalogy, Beastology, and DNA-Scrambling technologyHead Chief First Researcher of LabsZ-9andZ-14

topics.topic_text: I had other questions.
topics.response_text: -Submit your questions! I shall respond - with deadly ANSWERS.-

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: -Our efforts have turned against us! In playing GOD, we created a MONSTER!-

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03BorousX8Cave01
topics.response_text: -{Warning to dog}Now... let the intruder have the Sonic Emitter schematics. Klein wants it, all right, boy? Let the intruder dig it up wherever you buried it.-{2D}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03BorousX8Cave02
topics.response_text: -Gabe, down! Down, boy! Stop it!-{2D}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03BorousX8School01
topics.response_text: -Attention students. This is the pre-recorded voice of your pre-recorded principal. Doctor Principal BOROUS!-{2D}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03BorousX8School03
topics.response_text: -You are in the LIBRARY. Be quiet here and filled with SHHHHH.-{2D}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03BorousX8School04
topics.response_text: -Down at the end of the hall is BALL storage. For jocks who like BALLS, like RICHIE MARCUS. Do you hear me, Betsy? RICHIE likes BALLS.-{2D}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03BorousX8School05
topics.response_text: -I am lord of this institution. Where once, long ago, I was a student here. Now, I am its OMNIPOTENT GOD-PRINCIPAL.-{2D}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03BorousX8School06
topics.response_text: -Please place all filthy propaganda books in the incinerator chute in the Sink, especially those with funny pictures of me in them.-{2D}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03BorousX8School07
topics.response_text: -Today the cafeteria will be serving... nothing, because I didn't build one.-{2D}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03BorousX8School08
topics.response_text: -School is a sacred trust. Even though I am a long-ago graduate of this hated facility...-{2D}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03BorousX8Tunnel01
topics.response_text: -Oh my, you got to the Residential Test! This is really Borous, by the way, hello again.{Impressed}None of us thought you would get this far.{2D}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03BorousX8Tunnel02
topics.response_text: -{Thinking}The Residential Test. Wasn't that shut down for some reason?-{2D}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03BorousX8Tunnel03
topics.response_text: -Ohhhhh yes, my PET, Gabe.{Chuckles}I'd forgotten about the old boy and the COUNTLESS experiments I'd done on him back at Higgs.-{2D}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03BorousX8Tunnel04
topics.response_text: -Gabe would bark and snarl and bite whenever ANYONE came to visit.-{2D}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03BorousX8Tunnel05
topics.response_text: -Gaaabe! I am sorry I put your brain in a bowl, boy. Oohhh, who's a good boy. YOU are!-{2D}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03DialogueBorousBigMTRandom
topics.response_text: {2D Announcement}-The Cazador Preserve and the Nightstalker Splicing facilities are strangely quiet. TOO quiet.-

topics.topic_text: Animal? Did you just call me an animal?
topics.response_text: -Yes, animal. Hormones, pores, GLANDS, all wrapped up in SKIN. Who knows what terrifying secrets lie beneath your EPIDERMIS?-

topics.topic_text: Do you always get this dramatic?
topics.response_text: -DRAMA? There is no DRAMA in Science! As I learned in High School, Science! is an intellectual pursuit DEVOID of bestial emotions.-

topics.topic_text: Calm down. I just had some questions.
topics.response_text: -Just as I feared! Questions, quizzes, just as there were in American High School! And if there are NO answers, how will the Think Tank graduate?-

topics.topic_text: Who are you - what do you do here?
topics.response_text: -BEFORE you is the brain of Dr. Borous. Head of Animalogy, Beastology, and DNA-Scrambling technology here at Big{"Mountain"}MT.-

topics.topic_text: Why have you leveled this place?
topics.response_text: -It was not our first choice of testing grounds. BUT... we no longer have the luxuries of our TEST CITIES.-

topics.topic_text: I want to know more about Mobius and the Forbidden Zone.
topics.response_text: -The malignant tumor that is Mobius plagues us ALL. His hunger for power, INSATIABLE.-

topics.topic_text: Why does Klein want these particular technologies?
topics.response_text: -There is LOGIC and purpose in it. If these technologies are needed to pierce the FORBIDDEN ZONE... so be IT.-

topics.topic_text: Can you tell me about the Big Empty?
topics.response_text: -That castrated nickname of our facility is NOT its true name. The true name is: BIG{Mountain}MT. Where are your manners?-

topics.topic_text: Can you tell me about the Big Em... uh, Big Mountain?
topics.response_text: -It is our HOME. THREATENED by the horrors of Mobius.-

topics.topic_text: You are responsible for Cazadores?
topics.response_text: -Indeed. Docile. Curious. Safe. Sterile. They are contained here at Big{"Mountain"}MT to preserve DNA and for observation.-

topics.topic_text: All right... when did you create Cazadores?
topics.response_text: -In... two thousand... let's see, carry the three... then count backwards from the Great Static... or beyond?-

topics.topic_text: Contained at Big Mountain? Those things are all over the Mojave!
topics.response_text: -No, such creatures are found only here, for research purposes. They would no more be capable of escape than breeding.-

topics.topic_text: What makes you think they haven't escaped?
topics.response_text: -Because Big{Mountain}MT's safety measures are far more sophisticated than their primitive animal instincts. WE are their lords and masters.-

topics.topic_text: I don't think they're sterile, they breed, all right.
topics.response_text: -I cannot expect a LOBOTOMITE to understand the careful surgical castrating procedures used in their creation.-

topics.topic_text: No, that's all right, trust me.
topics.response_text: -Oh, that's too bad. Perhaps we can perform a sterility castration some other time, then.-

topics.topic_text: Go ahead, you might make me more fertile or impregnate me.
topics.response_text: -Impregnate YOU? What, do you want to make me VOMIT inside my tank?-

topics.topic_text: So Nightstalkers were created for what purpose, then?
topics.response_text: -To preserve coyote... no, no, wait. The snake DNA was important because... the snakes with the rattles were dying out, and...-

topics.topic_text: Give me a single, concrete fact. One. Fact.
topics.response_text: -Why are we even DEBATING this?-

topics.topic_text: Test cities?
topics.response_text: -YES. In the past... individuals would come to us. Pay for technology. And if their town, community, or city was jusssst right...-

topics.topic_text: What was this explosion?
topics.response_text: -BOOM! Yes. Quite unexpected. And embarrassing. All better now after the landscaping, though. MUCH more pleasing to our monitors.-

topics.topic_text: Is this Gabe's bowl? Your dog from X-8, Gabe?
topics.response_text: -WHAT?{Dawning recognition as sees old dog bowl}Why... yes, it is. I used to leave it outside his dog house, chock-full of chems. Before the cybernetic modifications, of course.-

topics.topic_text: Tell me about this "Radar Fence" around the Crater.
topics.response_text: -The RADAR FENCE protects us all! If evidence is correct, the one who built it - is ME!-

topics.topic_text: That fence doesn't make much sense to me.
topics.response_text: -It makes PERFECT sense. Who are you to question the MIGHTY RADAR FENCE.-

topics.topic_text: So I get my brain back, I can leave.
topics.response_text: -WHAT? Why would you do either of those things? That is MADNESS.-

topics.topic_text: Wait a minute - that means you're trapped here?
topics.response_text: -TRAPPED? NONSENSE, we are SECURE here. From evil philosophies.-

topics.topic_text: Don't you want to leave here?
topics.response_text: -NO! Beyond... is DEATH, despite mounting evidence to the contrary!-

topics.topic_text: Evidence to the contrary?
topics.response_text: -ENOUGH! Stop filling my precious brain cell units with irrelevant data!-

topics.topic_text: Does this dog bowl look familiar?
topics.response_text: -WHAT?{Dawning recognition as sees old dog bowl}Oh... something familiar about it, yes. Is it... a Cazador skull? Always were bowl-shaped. Or were those the Bowlians we made?-

topics.topic_text: Sounds like Gabe really loved you.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] -{Slowly, taking it in}Why... yes. Gabe.-

topics.topic_text: Well, it seems to me it belongs to a friend of yours.
topics.response_text: -{DUPE: Slowly, taking it in}Why... yes. Gabe.-

topics.topic_text: Blindly operate on any poor animals recently?
topics.response_text: -Why, YES. Although the term is RESEARCH. Thank you.-

topics.topic_text: < Test Node: Do Not Translate >
topics.response_text: -{Slowly, slightly getting sad}No matter how awful my day had been, he... he was always waiting there. How odd. My gel is de-coagulating.-

topics.topic_text: It sounds to me like you hurt someone who loved you very much.
topics.response_text: -As odd as it is, I believe that is the conclusion. And... I wonder why it didn't hit me before, until I saw that memory in your hands.-

topics.topic_text: It's nothing to be ashamed of. Gabe knew his place - as a specimen.
topics.response_text: -Thank you. If you don't mind, I need a moment. To collect myself. Sort it out. Re-orient my... sense of self.-

topics.topic_text: Hope you think on what you've done.
topics.response_text: -I can't seem to... not think about it. How odd.-

topics.topic_text: Helped any animals discover their genetic potential recently?
topics.response_text: -INDEED. After the memory you accessed about Gabe, I've been looking for ways to help nurture life.-

topics.topic_text: How much surgery did you do on me? I feel like a badly-put-together jigsaw puzzle.
topics.response_text: -First, was the HEART!-

topics.topic_text: Pylons? What pylons?
topics.response_text: -The mighty radar fence protects us ALL! Get too close to the blinking posts, and the proximity warning shall be your... WARNING you are too close!-

topics.topic_text: Uh... thanks.
topics.response_text: -Force fields prevent us from moving! FORward or BACKward!-

topics.topic_text: You removed my brain?
topics.response_text: -Once the brain was out, then came the COILS. The TESLA coils... the coils of NIKOLA Tesla.-

topics.topic_text: I can't let you dissect the Mojave. Or let you leave.
topics.response_text: -{Quiet, sad - actually leveling out}I, for one, cannot bear to let this continue.-

topics.topic_text: <Debug Topic Node - Do Not Translate. >
topics.response_text: -Dr. Klein, WAIT! I... I don't believe those gestures were random. Random AT ALL.-

topics.topic_text: < Debug Topic Node - Do Not Translate. >
topics.response_text: -The FORBIDDEN ZONE, where no brain has EVER entered! Nor ever RETURNED.-

topics.topic_text: The faster I can get through this, the better.
topics.response_text: -So many sciences and developments! Pass them by! Let impatience and the desire to simply finish, to end it all, quickly and carelessly guide you!-

topics.topic_text: What if I take my time, explore the crater?
topics.response_text: -There are things here no Lobotomite was MEANT to see, things that would ASTOUND! And possibly terrify. TERRIFY!-

topics.topic_text: < Debug Topic Node - Gun Branch/Skill Check Storage - Do Not Translate. >
topics.response_text: -A GUN! Are you MAD?! We can't give it a GUN! GUNS kill, leave big open holes in you that are like sores but WORSE.-

topics.topic_text: If you have the gun already, I don't understand what you need.
topics.response_text: -And it is LOST in X-8! Just as X-8 is forever lost to us! The sadness of my high-school days! The sadness of my YOUTH, MY youth! LOST!-

topics.topic_text: What are these technologies?
topics.response_text: -The psycho-analytic cardiac-dampening sneaky stealth suit, a suit like NOTHING this world has ever heard, seen, or could EVER see!-

topics.topic_text: I'll head out, then, and be back with these... things.
topics.response_text: -NO! That would put it too CLOSE to us! It could press BUTTONS, turn lights ON and OFF, and worse, let OTHER Lobotomites in!-

topics.topic_text: This can only work on fields here in the crater?
topics.response_text: -It is LOST! All questions lead to this conclusion! The blue fields within Big MT shall be fielded with force... FOREVER.-

topics.topic_text: You took out my brain, heart, and spine?
topics.response_text: -If so, it was FLUSHED all the way to MOBIUS! Fwooooooosh!{Beat, matter-of-fact}That... is the sound of FLUSHING.-

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03EndingSlideX8
topics.response_text: {Narration}{X-8 not repeated}As the Courier made his way through the X-8 facility, the computers analyzed the test subject's movements.

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03X8Countdown06
topics.response_text: -SIX! Halfway to destruction, measured in clicks!-{2D}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03X8CountdownOpening
topics.response_text: -Gabe! NO! His Cyberdog atomic core - it's ACTIVE! That means an exceedingly IMPRECISE countdown to critical failure in...-{2D}

topics.topic_text: You don't seem to have a grasp on your own research.
topics.response_text: -NONSENSE! That is what you speak. NONSENSE from beyond!-

conversation.response_text: -The Lobotomite! Has it come for HELLOS? You'll get no such satisfaction from ME.-

combat.response_text: -The VICIOUS ATTACK ENDS... as quickly as it BEGAN!-
-An attack in the Dome - from BEYOND the Dome!-
{Player throws a bomb at Borous}-The Lobotomite! It's exploding all over me!-
-Borous FALLS! The audience GASPS in TERROR!-
-There is no hope! Run for your intellect!-
